headline: Robinhood Is a ‘Prime Candidate’ for S&P 500 Addition, BofA Says
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Robinhood Markets Inc. is a “prime candidate” to enter the S&P 500 Index in the rebalancing set to be announced Friday, a milestone that would spur passive funds to snap up shares of the online brokerage, according to Bank of America Corp. headline: C's Business Overhaul Progresses Well: Is This Convincing Investors?
summary: Citigroup's sweeping business overhaul, including job cuts, market exits and management streamlining, targets $2.5B in annual savings by 2026.

headline: Record $50.4 million raised for charitable causes at 2025 Boston Marathon presented by Bank of America
summary: The Boston Athletic Association (B.A.A.) announced today the total funds raised through the 2025 Boston Marathon presented by Bank of America reached a record $50.4 million -- surpassing last year's single-year record of $45.7 million.

headline: I Prefer Bank of America Over Citigroup After Berkshire Hathaway Divestitures
summary: Berkshire Hathaway trims stakes in BoA and Citi amid macro risks. Read more about the reasons behind the divestitures and why we still like BAC stock over Citi.
